price: 101. Hubaal, kuwa (Nabi Ciise, hooyadi Maryam, iyo addoomaha Alle ee kale ee wanaagsan) ay u hor martay xaggayaga wanaagga, kuwaasu xaggeeda (Naarta) waa laga fogeyn.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
